sik.common
Interface RMIServer

All Superinterfaces:
java.rmi.Remote
public interface RMIServer
extends java.rmi.Remote

The RMI Server interface. It contains the methods that must be implemented when a class implements this RMI server. In this case an interface must be used to allow an RMI client and RMI server implementation to invoke one an other's methods remotely

Author:
Jamie Brindle (06352322) - Manchester Metropolitan University

Method Summary
 void dispatchMessage(java.lang.String theMessage)
          Used to return a supplied message to the server logger, which displays and records any specified message from this RMI server or an RMI client
 Store getStore_silent()
          Returns a student records store.

Method Detail

getStudentRecord

StudentRecord getStudentRecord(java.lang.String uniqueInput,
                               java.lang.String computerName,
                               boolean isRFIDInput)
                               throws java.rmi.RemoteException
Used to return a student record object

Parameters:
uniqueInput - Defined a unique identifier of a student record which will either be an RFID tag serial number or a student ID number
computerName - The computer host name of the machine which invoked this method
isRFIDInput - Defines whether the uniqueInput is of type RFID serial or student ID number and which corresponding operation to perform
Returns:
studentRecord The student record object in which to return
Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException - When some remote connectivity problems occur

dispatchMessage

void dispatchMessage(java.lang.String theMessage)
                     throws java.rmi.RemoteException
Used to return a supplied message to the server logger, which displays and records any specified message from this RMI server or an RMI client

Parameters:
theMessage - The message to be displayed
Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException

saveStore

void saveStore(Store store,
               java.lang.String computerName)
               throws java.rmi.RemoteException
Saves a supplied student records store to a local file

Parameters:
store - The store object to save
computerName - The name of the computer that invoked this message
Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException - When any remote connectivity problems occur

getStore

Store getStore(java.lang.String computerName)
               throws java.rmi.RemoteException
Returns a student records store, while recording the details of the computer host which invoked this methods

Parameters:
computerName - The name of the computer which invoked this method
Returns:
store The student records store object to return
Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException

getStore_silent

Store getStore_silent()
                      throws java.rmi.RemoteException
Returns a student records store. It's similar to the getStore() method however it does not record any details of the remote method invoker

Returns:
store The student records store object in which to return
Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException
See Also:
getStore(String)
